ResearchProjectDef.label: dwarven stout brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Prepare dwarven stout, a drink so thick that it can partially fill the drinker's tummy! The recipe is obscure and varies between different dwarf groups, so you may need a dwarf to research this.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create crossbows, a medieval alternative to things like hunting rifles and pistols. Their damage is similar to hunting rifles, but they have a slightly inferior firing rate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ballista
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create ballistae, which are large crossbow-like weapons mounted in place. They require loading individual bolts, but each bolt can easily punch through armor and remove limbs.
